name: reporter
description: Transform mint transactions into summary csvs for use in a tracking sheet

scripts.stage1: npm run tsc && STAGE=writeInitialData START_DATE=12/01/2024 END_DATE=12/31/2024 node dist/reporter.js
scripts.stage2: npm run tsc && STAGE=writeFinalSummary node dist/reporter.js
scripts.dev: npm run tsc && FILE_EXTS=.CSV START_DATE=01/01/2024 END_DATE=01/31/2024 nodemon dist/reporter.js
scripts.test:stage1: npm run tsc && STAGE=writeInitialData FILE_EXTS=.test START_DATE=01/01/2000 END_DATE=01/01/3000 node dist/reporter.js
scripts.test:stage2: npm run tsc && STAGE=writeFinalSummary FILE_EXTS=.test START_DATE=01/01/2000 END_DATE=01/01/3000 node dist/reporter.js

author: Jimmy Kuruvilla
